results.title: Report a missed bin | East Herts District Council
results.snippet: If your bin collection has been missed, you can let us know using our online reporting service. You must make this report within two days of your missed ...

results.title: Missed Bin Report - Information - My East Herts
results.snippet: How it works: · Report online – Complete the form to notify us of the missed collection. · Provide details – Confirm your collection date and bin type.

results.title: Report a Missed Trade Waste Bin Form | East Herts District Council
results.snippet: If your trade waste bin collection has been missed, you can let us know using our online form.

results.title: Bins, Waste and Recycling | East Herts District Council
results.snippet: The new bin collection service has started. If you haven't received the correct bins or are missing any bins, please report it here.

results.title: Waste Services - My East Herts
results.snippet: Bulky Waste. Arrange for the collection of large household items. Find out more. Report a Missed Bin Collection. Notify ...

results.title: Find your bin collection day | East Herts District Council
results.snippet: The new bin collection service has started. If you haven't received the correct bins or are missing any bins, please report it here.

selected_links.title: Report a missed bin | East Herts District Council
strengths: Direct link to the online service for reporting missed bin collection
The item's snippet confirms that it allows users to notify the council of a missed collection within two days of occurrence
selected_links.reasoning: This link provides a direct and quick way for customers to report a missed bin collection, which aligns directly with the customer information needs.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content doesn't directly answer the question, but it does provide a mechanism to report a missed bin collection. The resident can navigate to the 'Report a problem with your bin' section and select 'My bin was not collected today'.
Reason.next_actions: Navigate to the East Hertfordshire Council website, click on 'Report a problem with your bin', choose the appropriate option, and follow the instructions to submit a request.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content, although concise, provides a means for residents to report missed bin collections. However, it could benefit from explicitly mentioning forgotten bin reporting within the main content area for quicker access.
